subject: Re: [junit] Re: Swingui TestRunner
msgSnippet: ... Please run WhichJUnit (in the Files section of this group) and report back on what it tells you is wrong. It s a test... Mike
messageBody:
parul_49 wrote:

>You are right, the excluded.prop did not come into play as yet.
>But I don't know how to make that.
>
>This is what I have done.
>First I created a dir under c:\ called XYZ. under that I have created
>junit/runner. In this dir I put the excluded.properties.
>I added c:\XYZ to my classpath.
>and then I added the junit.jar
>It still did not work.
>
>So then I decided to replace the excluded.prop in the jar with a new
>one, so I extracted the whole junit.jar, but could not find the
>excluded.prop file anywhere
>
>What am I doing wrong?
>

Please run WhichJUnit (in the Files section of this group) and report
back on what it tells you is wrong.

It's a test...

Mike
